title: Tunisian griddled chicken
ingredients: ['2 chicken breast fillets', '1 teaspoon ground coriander, or to taste', '1 teaspoon ground cumin, or to taste', '1 teaspoon chilli powder, or to taste', '1 garlic clove, minced', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'Yoghurt dip', '125g natural or Greek style yoghurt', '1/2 teaspoon harissa, or to taste', '1 pinch caster sugar, or 1/2 teaspoon honey']
